item.title: #67 Cordless Phones Stump Us
item.dc:creator: Sean Birch
item.description:
In this episode of the Deemable Tech podcast, Ray, Tom and producer Sean answer more of your burning tech questions. The guys take on a mysterious beeping cordless phone, discuss giving permissions to the Facebook app, and help a listener more Â»

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
Original image credit: darranl / Flickr

In this episode of the Deemable Tech podcast, Ray, Tom and producer Sean answer more of your burning tech questions. The guys take on a mysterious beeping cordless phone, discuss giving permissions to the Facebook app, and help a listener with a broken webcam.

Then it’s time for everyone’s favorite podcast game, DOES NOT COMPUTE! Tom quizzes Ray and Sean about obscure facts in this game where it’s more about the conversation than the answers and the points don’t matter. How did you do on all of these questions? Send us an email to feedback@deemable.com and let us know.

And, if you haven’t already done so, please leave a review of the Deemable Tech podcast in iTunes. As more of you review the show, the higher it’s listed in iTunes, allowing new listeners to more easily discover us. And don’t forget to sign up for our newsletter where we deliver these podcast episodes and our radio segments straight to your inbox each week.

Download: #67 Cordless Phones Stump Us
